name: 3 MARKS of  Existence
value: sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā – all saṅkhāras (conditioned things) are impermanent sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā – all saṅkhāras are unsatisfactory, imperfect, unstable sabbe dhammā anattā – all dharmas (conditioned or unconditioned things) have no unchanging self or sou
